name: Sneeky Pumkins
description:
The goal of this game is to find all of the 7 pumkins hidden around the world

a,w,d or arrow keys movement

Thanks to gameart2d.com(twice, for the pumkin sprites and tilemap),  and http://bevouliin.com for the spikes!

to play, download the zip file then extract it, then run(double click) the exe file/ the one thats called halloweengame then have fun!
